short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search for records by ID using the URL bar. Not officially supported by Salesforce.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find in Salesforce: Your Lightning-Fast Record Lookup Companion

Supercharge your Salesforce workflow with instant record access directly from your browser's address bar. No more clicking through multiple pages or navigating complex menus ‚Äì just type and go!

üöÄ KEY FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Lightning-fast record lookup using just 'sf' + record ID
‚Ä¢ Works with any Salesforce record type (Accounts, Contacts, Opportunities, Custom Objects, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Zero impact on browser performance
‚Ä¢ Simple setup and configuration

‚ö° GETTING STARTED:
1. After installation, click the extension icon, or go to the extension options, or click on the extension icon
2. Enter your Salesforce organization's root URL (e.g., https://mycompany.my.salesforce.com) and save it
3. Type 'sf' in your address bar
4. Press TAB to activate the search
5. Enter any Salesforce ID (15 or 18 characters)
6. Hit Enter to instantly jump to that record

üéØ PERFECT FOR:
‚Ä¢ Sales Representatives jumping between customer records
‚Ä¢ Support Teams accessing cases quickly
‚Ä¢ Administrators managing multiple record types
‚Ä¢ Developers needing quick access to configuration pages
‚Ä¢ Anyone who works extensively with Salesforce

üîí PRIVACY & SECURITY:
‚Ä¢ No data collection or tracking
‚Ä¢ Works entirely within your browser
‚Ä¢ No external server dependencies
‚Ä¢ Open source for complete transparency


ü§ù NOT AFFILIATED WITH SALESFORCE:
This is a community-created tool designed to enhance your Salesforce experience. It is not officially associated with or endorsed by Salesforce.

Try Find in Salesforce today and transform the way you navigate Salesforce!

Changes in 1.1: 
- Now possible to configure the URL directly from clicking the extension icon
